topic.title: Ct Scan Of Thorax - conformance rules

section.p: Cat scan of thorax. An image produced by a CAT scanner. Also called CT scan. [Source: The American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language, Fourth Edition]

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] ctScanOfThorax with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test CT SCAN. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfCtScanOfThorax with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test CT SCAN.

Contains exactly one [1..1] ctScanOfThorax with data type Code
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test CT SCAN. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfCtScanOfThorax with data type Point In Time
The date of the diagnostic test CT SCAN.
